title: TRACE Evidence
description: Proof that required checks for an action have been satisfied (human or automated).

actionId.description: The Action.id this evidence is attached to.

approver.description: Optional human approver handle or ID.

timestamp.description: When the evidence was issued (server may override).

signed.description: Whether this payload includes a signature (for future integrity mode).

hash.description: Optional content hash for integrity (e.g., SHA-256 of canonicalized evidence).
